list.show_or_hide_descripton_one: This is the new decentralized list system. From here you can manage your own mute list or blacklist, as well as subscribe to the mute lists and blacklists of other users. There are some new fields on the
list.show_or_hide_descripton_two: page where you can set a description of how you choose who you've added to your lists and if there are any actions that account can take to get removed from them. You can see the descriptions of the lists of other accounts by browsing directly to their personal blacklist or mute list page. These links can be found on their profile page below the follower information. To get started, we recommend that you follow the blacklists/mute lists of these accounts: hive.blog

profile.cancel_power_down_prompt: Are you sure you want to cancel Power Down?
profile.hive_description: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime. Hive can be converted to HIVE POWER in a process called powering up.
profile.hp_description: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards. Part of {{username}}'s HIVE POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on Hive. Your delegation amount can fluctuate. HIVE POWER increases at an APR of approximately {{value}}%, subject to blockchain variance.
profile.hive_dolar_description: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
profile.savings_description: Balances subject to 3 day withdraw waiting period. HBD interest rate: 20.00% APR (as voted by the
profile.estimated_account_value_description: The estimated value is based on an average value of Hive in US dollars.
profile.the_next_power_down: The next power down is scheduled to happen in
profile.account_history_description: Beware of spam and phishing links in transfer memos. Do not open links from users you do not trust. Do not provide your private keys to any third party websites. Transactions will not show until they are confirmed on the blockchain, which may take a few minutes.
profile.delegated_tooltip: HIVE POWER delegated to/from this account
profile.potential_author_rewards_info: Potential rewards haven't been added to balance yet. During the 7-day period, the community decides on the final rewards distribution through voting.
profile.governance_expiry_warning: Witness votes auto-expire {{duration}} after your last governance transaction. Your present votes will expire on {{date}}. Please
profile.governance_expired: Your Witnesses votes have expired on {{date}}. Please
profile.please_vote_for_witnesses: It looks like you have not yet voted for Witnesses, you can do so on the

witnesses_page.title: Witness Voting
witnesses_page.setted_proxy_description: You have set a voting proxy. If you would like to re-enable manual voting, please clear your proxy.
witnesses_page.you_are_about_remove_vote: You are about to remove your vote for this witness
witnesses_page.you_can_vote_for_maximum_of_witnesses: You can vote for a maximum of 30 witnesses
witnesses_page.witness_list_notes: Notes: in the list below, the first 100 witnesses are unfiltered, this includes active and inactive witnesses. Past the rank of 100, witnesses will be filtered out of the list if they have not produced any block for the last 30 days.
witnesses_page.vote_description: If you would like to vote for a witness outside of the top 200, enter the account name below to cast a vote.
witnesses_page.proxy_description: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses_page.use_this_for_linking_title: Use this for linking to this page and highlight the selected witness
witnesses_page.has_not_produced_blocks: ⚠️Has not produced any blocks for over a week.

proxy_form.title: Confirm Account Witness Proxy
proxy_form.description: You are about to remove your proxy.

transfers_page.already_power_down: You are already powering down {{amount}} HIVE({{withdrawn}} HIVE paid out so far). Note that if you change the power down amount the payout schedule will reset.
transfers_page.delegating: You are delegating {{amount}} HIVE. That amount is locked up and not available to power down until the delegation is removed and 5 days have passed
transfers_page.financial_report_description: Use this to generate a CSV file containing financial transactions from your history within the selected date range. Depending on how active your account is, it might take a little while to complete.

error.account_length_min: Account name is too short. Use at least 3 characters.
error.account_length_max: Account name is too long. Use max 16 characters.

transfers_page.power_up_info: Converted HIVE POWER can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to HIVE.
transfers_page.bad_actors_info: Use caution sending to this account. Please double check your spelling for possible phishing.
transfers_page.transfer_to_account_desc: Move funds to another Hive account.
transfers_page.transfer_to_desc: Protect funds by requiring a 3 day withdraw waiting period.
transfers_page.power_up_desc: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards. HIVE POWER is non-transferable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to HIVE.
transfers_page.savings_withdraw_desc: Withdraw funds after the required 3 day waiting period.
